amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to require the FEC to notify states within 30 days of making a determination that a foreign national has initiated or attempted to initiate a disinformation campaign targeted at an election in a state.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
